title: POTS — Pharmacy Order Tracking System
short: Real-time pharmacy order tracking and management platform
description: A digital platform that enables pharmacies to place, view, and track compounding orders in real time. Features secure authentication, multi-stage order tracking, role-based access, and content safety.

title: EyeMo — AI Voice-Controlled Accessibility
short: Tap-activated voice commands, OCR and scene analysis for visual accessibility
description: EyeMo empowers people with visual impairments through tap-activated voice commands, instant OCR with speech output, AI-powered scene analysis, and voice-announced location services using Azure and OpenAI.
